page.title: 07Canal:Conflict In Use.
page.content: Mr.Pitkin had hoped to restore the Canal and make it work properly.This would have cost a great deal.A Canal Trust was set up to finance the clearance + repairs of the project. Mr.Pitkin wanted to run educational + pleasure trips on the Canal when it was restored. The Canal was partially cleared.This destroyed much of the wildlife + disturbed the habitat of many wild animals.Local people,who lived near the end of the Canal also began to object about the disturbance the renovation made. In June 1985 the Canal Trust decided to abandon the plans for renovation because it was so expensive They sold the Canal to the Gloucestershire Conservation Society, who plan to make the Canal into a nature resort.
